Amulets of restoration were enchanted necklaces of gemstones and delicate chains with their center stone mottled with age and said to had been dyed by the tears of some unnamed martyr.
The wearer of this amulet could cast the healing word and mass healing word once per day each.
Circa the , one of the amulets of restoration belonged to the dwarven herbalist from Baldurs Gate named Derryth Bonecloak. She carried the amulet along with some of her stock while gathering fungi by the Ebonlake Grotto in the Underdark. Another amulet of restoration was stashed away in the Counting House of Baldurs Gate.
